name: GOATWRATH (UPDATED VERSION)
description:
If you are going to rate my game on Ludum Dare, please do not rate the audio based on the music. It was not in the original submission. Either vote purely based off the SFX or skip the audio category altogether.

This is a reworked version of Goatwrath, based on the feedback I got on the game.

Added - Music (Made by https://soundcloud.com/xarxahar), made the game easier to beat, more clear descriptions for the sacrifice function and a bug warning message.
